column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Great ramen spot in midtown. Definitely can see why it's one of everyone's favorite ramen restaurants here in houston. I really liked the interior decor and ambiance of this hip ramen spot. I got sat at the long middle table which has a lot of stool chairs where people share and sit close to one another. For appetizer we ordered gyoza
column2: and the karaage. Definitely order the smallest portion of this that you can
column3: I did and I thought it wasn't enough
column4: but when they came out it was huge. We didn't even finish this chicken
column5: we had to take the rest to go. The fried dumpling/gyoza was really good. Takoyaki was also very good
column6: great sharing size as well. Ramen here was great
column7: and I like how you can add whatever toppings you like inside. Chopped garlic was free.
